HGNC-to-Ensembl gene identifier mappings

Source: R/HGNC2Ensembl.R
HGNC2Ensembl.Rd

HGNC-to-Ensembl gene identifier mappings

HGNC2Ensembl()

Value

HGNC2Ensembl.

Note

Updated 2020-10-03.

Examples

object <- HGNC2Ensembl()

#> → Importing HGNC complete set.
#> → Caching URL at <ftp://ftp.ebi.ac.uk/pub/databases/genenames/new/tsv/hgnc_complete_set.txt>.
#> → Importing 1338e1b3d01be_hgnc_complete_set.txt at /Users/mike/Library/Caches/AcidGenomes using vroom::`vroom()`.
#> → Mapping HGNC identifiers to Ensembl.
print(object)

#> HGNC2Ensembl with 39250 rows and 2 columns
#>            hgnc         ensembl
#>       <integer>     <character>
#> 5             5 ENSG00000121410
#> 7             7 ENSG00000175899
#> 8             8 ENSG00000256069
#> 15           15 ENSG00000253937
#> 16           16 ENSG00000196136
#> ...         ...             ...
#> 55269     55269 ENSG00000270006
#> 55270     55270 ENSG00000269961
#> 55271     55271 ENSG00000269859
#> 55272     55272 ENSG00000269696
#> 55273     55273 ENSG00000269473
